Export.name: sql
Export.label: 假期-月报表
Export.sql:
SELECT
 WORK_NUMBER,
 USER_LABEL,
 ORGANIZATION_LABEL,
 CA_LENGTH,
 CP_TIME_SPAN.Format_Day_By_Calendar(CA_LENGTH, '90.0000', CALENDAR_ID) CA_LABEL,
 VT_LENGTH,
 CP_TIME_SPAN.Format_Day_By_Calendar(VT_LENGTH, '90.0000', CALENDAR_ID) VT_LABEL,
 SK_LENGTH,
 CP_TIME_SPAN.Format_Day_By_Calendar(SK_LENGTH, '90.0000', CALENDAR_ID) SK_LABEL,
 MR_LENGTH,
 CP_TIME_SPAN.Format_Day_By_Calendar(MR_LENGTH, '90.0000', CALENDAR_ID) MR_LABEL,
 MO_LENGTH,
 CP_TIME_SPAN.Format_Day_By_Calendar(MO_LENGTH, '90.0000', CALENDAR_ID) MO_LABEL,
 MA_LENGTH,
 CP_TIME_SPAN.Format_Day_By_Calendar(MA_LENGTH, '90.0000', CALENDAR_ID) MA_LABEL,
 VR_LENGTH,
 CP_TIME_SPAN.Format_Day_By_Calendar(VR_LENGTH, '90.0000', CALENDAR_ID) VR_LABEL
FROM (
 SELECT
 PM_USER_COMPANY_DI.Get_Work_Number_By_User_Id(OUID) WORK_NUMBER,
 PM_USER_DI.Get_Full_Label(OUID) USER_LABEL,
 PM_USER_COMPANY_DI.Get_Fit_Calendar(OUID) CALENDAR_ID,
 PM_ORGANIZATION_DI.Find_Main_Organization_Label(OUID) ORGANIZATION_LABEL,
 PM_USER_COMPANY_REST_DI.Calculate_Rest_Type_Length('CA', OUID, CP_DATE.Parse('${BEGIN_DATE}'), CP_DATE.Parse('${END_DATE}')) CA_LENGTH,
 PM_USER_COMPANY_REST_DI.Calculate_Rest_Type_Length('VT', OUID, CP_DATE.Parse('${BEGIN_DATE}'), CP_DATE.Parse('${END_DATE}')) VT_LENGTH,
 PM_USER_COMPANY_REST_DI.Calculate_Rest_Type_Length('SK', OUID, CP_DATE.Parse('${BEGIN_DATE}'), CP_DATE.Parse('${END_DATE}')) SK_LENGTH,
 PM_USER_COMPANY_REST_DI.Calculate_Rest_Type_Length('MR', OUID, CP_DATE.Parse('${BEGIN_DATE}'), CP_DATE.Parse('${END_DATE}')) MR_LENGTH,
 PM_USER_COMPANY_REST_DI.Calculate_Rest_Type_Length('MO', OUID, CP_DATE.Parse('${BEGIN_DATE}'), CP_DATE.Parse('${END_DATE}')) MO_LENGTH,
 PM_USER_COMPANY_REST_DI.Calculate_Rest_Type_Length('MA', OUID, CP_DATE.Parse('${BEGIN_DATE}'), CP_DATE.Parse('${END_DATE}')) MA_LENGTH,
 PM_USER_COMPANY_REST_DI.Calculate_Remain_Vacation(OUID) VR_LENGTH
 FROM PM_USER
WHERE PM_USER_COMPANY_DI.Is_Valid_Staff_In_Date(OUID, CP_DATE.Parse('${BEGIN_DATE}')) = 'Y')
ORDER BY WORK_NUMBER
Export.dataset_parameters:
SELECT
 TO_CHAR(CP_DATE.Parse('${BEGIN_DATE}'), 'YYYYMMDD') SETTLEMENT_BEGIN_DATE,
 TO_CHAR(CP_DATE.Parse('${END_DATE}'), 'YYYYMMDD') SETTLEMENT_END_DATE
FROM DUAL
